children.text: Often people get on this treadmill because they do not have a complete and shared understanding of the context of the topic.  I find stopping and taking a second to help define the entire universe gets us off the treadmill and on to the meat of the discussion.
Deep Work vs. Shallow Work Example

My book club has been reading Deep Work which defines two kinds of work early in the book, Deep Work and Shallow Work.  
We kept going round in circles on whether work x was deep or shallow work. Some of us saw Shallow Work as Not Deep work, some of us saw Deep Work as Not Shallow work, we all saw this world:
